DecisionMatrixDefinitionVersion.name: DecisionMatrixDefinitionVersion
DecisionMatrixDefinitionVersion.description: Represents information about a decision matrix definition version.

DecisionMatrixDefinitionId.description: The decision matrix definition associated with this decision matrix definition version. This is a required field.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the decision matrix definition version.

FullName.description: Full name of the associated metadata type in Metadata API. Query this field only if the query result contains no more than one record. Otherwise, an error is returned. If more than one record exists, use multiple queries to retrieve the records. This limit protects performance.

Language.description: The language in which this decision matrix definition version is created.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package.

MasterLabel.description: The label of the decision matrix definition version.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix.

Status.description: The status of this decision matrix definition version.

VersionNumber.description: The version number of this decision matrix definition version. This is a required field.
